Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell's (SOFC) perovskite cathode powder La1-xSrxMnO3-delta(0.1<0.5) were synthesized by citric acid method.
Titulo: Investigation of Nanosized La1-xSrxMnO3-δ Powder Prepared by Citric Acid Method

Sentencas: Many technical parameters affecting the properties of powder, such as pH value, chelators amount and calcining temperature, were investigated.
Titulo: Investigation of Nanosized La1-xSrxMnO3-δ Powder Prepared by Citric Acid Method

Sentencas: pH value is a key factor in the experiment whose optimum value is 3.
Titulo: Investigation of Nanosized La1-xSrxMnO3-δ Powder Prepared by Citric Acid Method

Sentencas: Glycol can be good for citric acid complex of metal ions; at the same time, appropriate increase of citric acid can improve the complex effects of citric acid to metal ions.
Titulo: Investigation of Nanosized La1-xSrxMnO3-δ Powder Prepared by Citric Acid Method

Sentencas: The optimum experimental conditions to prepare cathode powder La1-xSrxMnO3-delta are as follows: citric acid method, pH value of 3, adding glycol, C/N of 2, and 1000 degrees C calcining temperature.
Titulo: Investigation of Nanosized La1-xSrxMnO3-δ Powder Prepared by Citric Acid Method
